description: A humorous twist on winter's chill, where a refrigerator gets a much-needed break.
title: Winter's Chill
n_1: A frosty day in a North American suburb, Alex jokes about the weather with Jamie.
c1_1: You know, our refrigerator is on vacation now.
n_2: They stand in the kitchen, a window open, letting in the cold air.
c1_2: Yep! It's so cold outside, we could just store our food there!
c2_2: Saves on the electricity bill, doesn't it?
n_3: Jamie places a carton of milk on the windowsill, laughing at the idea.
c1_3: Our own natural freezer. Who needs technology?
c2_3: Just hope the squirrels don't find our stash!
n_4: They share a laugh, enjoying the simplicity and humor of winter's silver lining.
c2_4: Let's just keep our snacks away from wildlife.
